alert.note: Alert for Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 10:02PM CDT until June 12 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Tarrant County in north central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Joshua, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Burleson, Benbrook, Crowley, Forest Hill, Kennedale, Everman, Rendon, Edgecliff Village, Pantego, Edgecliff, Dalworthington Gardens, Lake Arlington, Benbrook Lake and Joe Pool Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
